answers.answer: Oh nnoo :( sorry to hear that mama! Does tylenol help your nerve pain? Im having EXTREME heartburn and diarrhea.  What a fun night! :p
Uhhhg that's worse! Lol I'm knocking on wood no heart burn tonight! But nope Tylenol ***** :( my doc said to use a heating pack

Lillyskins talk to your doctor about seeing a chiropractor I have sciatica really bad too and I couldn't walk or get out of the bed without help and I started seeing a chiropractor and I don't have any trouble now
It gets so bad sometimes, I'm going to look into that because somethings gotta give.. My doc told me last week there was nothing he could do for me which made me very angry

question: I have gestational diabetes and this little nerve in my back is KILLLING ME!FML.How are you ladies doing lol.
